lines.text: an eight-year-old with a badge!
Your grandmother should be reported to Social Services!
And you should be reported to the Orkin Man!

[Surprising Devon]
How's it goin, fart head?
Mister big shot with the Cops, huh?
Don't You morons have anything else better to do?

[Rio throws jacket on the ground]
What'd You that for?
Cause You called Me a moron!
So throwing your jacket on the ground makes You smarter?
This Kid's driving Me nuts!

[Looking at Vinnies Car, then giving the two Bullies a serious look]
You know guys, I can't kid around anymore, I gotta watch over My Grandmas Car...
Ohhh, so you're Here with Grandma?
Ah, so this is Grandmammys Car?
Guys, please, bust Me up, but not the Car, please!
You mean... don't do this?
[Smashes a pair of headlights]

[Backing up a step]
That's exactly what I mean!
...or this?
[Smashes the other pair of headlights, and denting the side]
[Devon starts backing up more and hides behind a Telephone Pole across the Street]

[Takes the Bat]
My turn... this is your kiss...
[kisses the windshield]
... goodbye!
[smashes the windshield, and and adds more dents to the side]

[Seeing the two Boys smashing up their Car]
Hey, whoa, what do You think you're doin?
Yeah, what do You think you're doin, huh?
[Chu kicks one of the two bullies who run off in fear]
...and if we ever find out where ya live we'll break your stupid necks!

[Looking at the broken windshield]
Look at this... LOOK at this, oh, these punks got no respect nowadays, c'mon, get in the car!
[trying to persuade his grandmother to play hooky from work]
But you're a nurse! You can make up some great disease!
So what you got under the hood?
I got an engine, and in a minute, you.
We do not have a love/hate relationship. We have a hate/hate relationship.
Give me a milk STEVE
[looks at all the bikers]
In a dirty glass.

[Devon is holding on to his leg]
What are you going to do about this?
This? I'm going to kill this.
Now tell me, what have you learned today? Sit up straight
That I can hold my breath a lot longer than I thought I could
Do I sense... uh... a little insolence?
No
Devon, Devon, Devon, Devon, lies are not explanations
I'm not lying... everyday these big jumbos... come and take my money... they put me in the toilet... and they hold me upside down
Bring the criminial back when you arrest them... Don't go... don't go let them eat... just bring them to jail! BRING THEM TO JAIL!

[chasing some bad guys with his car]
I told you, I'm not getting out of this car. I hate to run!
[slips and falls down]
[comes right after him with his car]
What are you a nut? Oh! Oh!
I warned you!
[smacks him with car door]

[seeing this]
Do all cops do that?

[grinning]
Only the best.

[now going after Quintero]
Quintero! Who do you think is going to run out of gas first?
[Rudy and Chu are carrying a kicking and screaming Devon]
Put me down Piggy!
[later after Devon tried calling the police, the two take him to Mr. Fountain in the drug area]
I knew it was drugs!
I'm sure... I'm sure that I told you to keep him in the office.
He was a bad boy boss.
He called me Piggy.
I like that.

[about Nick]
You take care of McKenna, he's fading fast.
I'm an 8-year-old, not a miracle worker.

[about the biker bar]
Don't you need a tattoo to get into this place?
Alright, now I want You to stay in the car, You go inside that Bar, and you get hurt...
[See's a couple of Bikers harassing another Biker, and picking up His Motorcycle like they're going to trash it]
Um... Better come inside, You stay out in the parking lot, and you'll get hurt!
What's your 10-20 McKenna?
We're perpendicular.
big heads, small brains.
Kids aren't any fun! You can't take a kid to a bar. He has one drink, he falls off the stool, and the trip is screwed!
Do you know who I am?
You used to be Nick McKenna before you lost a step.

[Devon tried to surprise Nick with a box of donuts, while being aware Vinnie's Men were determined to kill Him]
People are trying to kill You, are You some kind of bonehead, or what?
I'm not, and You don't have to yell!
I can't handle this anymore, I can't handle it... look, pick a City, Cincinnati, Cleveland, You take You and your grandmother, You go there, I'll pay for it!
You call this being a Father?

[Softly]
I'm not your Father...
[Loudly]
... and I ain't your Partner, either!
Fine! I don't want You to be My Father, I don't want You to be My Partner, I don't want You to be anything!
[Slams box of Donuts on sidewalk, walks across the corner to catch a Bus at the Bus stop]
I'll just handle things, Myself!

[talking to the Person dressed in a blue costume]
Is your name Bobo?
...in blue!
C'mon, I don't think this is the Guy...
I didn't know Art can be so dangerous!
Leaving him alone again I see.
Sticking your sweet face in everybody's business again I see.

[Upon meeting Vinnie for the first time, as Vinnie makes an entrance singing a 50's Song]
I'm so happy to meet You, I love your singing, do You have an album out?
You wouldn't be saying that just to butter Me up, would ya, cause I detest... hypocrisy!

[Nodding]
No, of course, not...

[Sniffing]
Whoa, Chu, smell a fish here, get rid of it.

[Tying and cuffing Quintero to his chair]
You got it, Boss!
Wait, what are ya doing, HEY, TURN LOOSE OF ME!
You know, in a fit of Nostalgia, I was gonna shoot You Myself, but I hate being so "hands on", and I hate Stoolies even more...
Well, sir, they got a witness.
And what did this witness *witness*?
It's just some kid. But we know where he lives.
How much could a little kid see?
[they all start to laugh]

[not amused]
I was a little kid once myself and I saw EVERYTHING.
Haven't you ever heard about secondary smoke?
Haven't you ever heard about minding your own business?
At this very moment, the pink delicate tissues of my still-forming lungs may be shriveling into green chunks of mucus struggling for their last gasp of poison brown air.

[throws his cigar out the window]
Happy?
Now you're littering.

[bored just sitting in the car]
What are we here for?
Stakeout. It's your shift.
Do I look like a five-year-old to you?
I can't tell. The light's not too good in here.
Deal's off. This is dullsville.
Police work is dullsville. What'd you have in mind?
Cop stuff. Shakedowns, shootouts, busting scumbags.

[to Nick]
I nabbed the purse snatcher.
[Devon is holding onto a man's leg]
My wife forgot her purse. I was trying to catch her before she got on the bus!
You're not a purse snatcher?
NO. I'm calling the cops.
I am a police officer.
Great. What are you gonna do about this?

[looking at Devon]
This? I'm gonna kill this.

Why do you think I spend HOURS and HOURS at the range... shooting at silhouettes, shooting the hearts right out of 'em? Every single day. I've been doin' that for years. Why do you think I do that? I do that because I don't wanna chase anybody. I DON'T LIKE TO RUN. So I want you to give me the plate number.
Hey, this is more like it. Partners are supposed to fight. Partner love/hate relationship.
We don't have a love/hate relationship! We have a HATE/HATE relationship.
There's no way out now, McKenna!
[Bobo takes Nick's car door]
What are you looking at, weenie?
